name: Lost Parts Archive--Test Run (demo)
description:
This is a story that involves an archive, an ibis, and a strange set of records that seemed to just appear out of nowhere.

The main character doesn't have name... he's almost like a ghost.

These records are the only thing that remains of him.  The question is... what happened to the rest ?

The demo ends right after you reach the second depth level, but I still recommend checking everything out. If you liked this, please leave a comment or spread the word.

I  recommend downloading the  "part" file. It's for something I've been testing out...

At the moment, there's nothing explicit in the base version of the game.
